article.title: TYBRIN Receives Contract from U.S. Air Force for System Engineering and Technical Assistance
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: TYBRIN Corporation's contract with the U.S. Air Force is being modified for an estimated $11.3 million. The cost-plus-fixed-fee contract provides system engineering and technical assistance support, including requirements definition, engineering management, risk education, developmental engineering, technical analysis, and acquisition management support, for a variety of research, test and evaluation, and training programs at the Air Force Flight Test Center Edwards Air Force Base, California.
